title: Scraped data of 2.6 million Duolingo users released on hacking forum
description: The scraped data of 2.6 million DuoLingo users was leaked on a hacking forum, allowing threat actors to conduct targeted phishing attacks using the exposed information. [...]

title: New Windows 11 policy lets admins control optional updates installation
description: Microsoft now provides administrators with a new Windows 11 policy that controls how monthly non-security preview updates are installed on enterprise devices. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5029351 preview update released with Search fixes
description: Microsoft has released the optional August 2023 cumulative update for Windows 11, version 22H2, with fixes for several issues affecting the Search app. [...]

title: New HiatusRAT malware attacks target US Defense Department
description: In a new HiatusRAT malware campaign, threat actors have targeted a server belonging to the U.S. Department of Defense in what researchers described as a reconnaissance attack. [...]

title: Microsoft Excel to let you run Python scripts as formulas
description: Microsoft is adding the Python programming language to Microsoft Excel, allowing users to create powerful functions for analyzing and manipulating data. [...]

title: Akira ransomware targets Cisco VPNs to breach organizations
description: There's mounting evidence that Akira ransomware targets Cisco VPN (virtual private network) products as an attack vector to breach corporate networks, steal, and eventually encrypt data. [...]

title: Carderbee hacking group hits Hong Kong orgs in supply chain attack
description: A previously unidentified APT hacking group named 'Carderbee' was observed attacking organizations in Hong Kong and other regions in Asia, using legitimate software to infect targets' computers with the PlugX malware. [...]
